findings.title: Lack of documentation on scaling of decimals of reward token
findings.description: Throughout the codebase, the reward tokens are being scaled up and down by six decimals to minimize token loss while calculating rewards per unit of staking token. However, there is a lack of information necessary for describing it to users.

findings.title: Possible gas optimization in storage
findings.description: Data type address can be arranged with data type bool to save gas.

findings.title: Do not reinitialize storage variables
findings.description: Reinitializing storage variables can lead to unintended behavior and affect the contract system negatively.

findings.title: Floating Pragma
findings.description: Not locking the pragma version can affect the contract system negatively.

findings.title: Stake Function Might Get Invokable
findings.description: The stake() function might always revert if apy gets below 10 and lastTimeApyLessThan10 is updated, or if there's a delay of more than a day between two calls to staking.

findings.title: Contract balance is not checked before adding rewards
findings.description: In notifyRewardAmount function, the respective balance for the reward being added is not checked, reward distributor maliciously can vouch to add millions of tokens but at the time of reward payout functions will revert.

findings.title: periodFinish value might get inaccurate
findings.description: In the notifyRewardAmount function, the periodFinish value might get inaccurate.
